snippet.title: Shape of the World - Teaser trailer: A first person exploration game.
snippet.description:
Shape of the World is a first person explorer where you’re cast as an outsider in a surreal organic world that reacts to your presence. Journey through a psychedelically colorful ecosystem of flourishing flora, rambling waterfalls, burgeoning mountains, glowing monoliths and graceful creatures.

Every step you take will leave a trace on the environment you’re exploring. The forest only materializes around you when you get close, regrowing in a new way each time you pass. As you wander, interacting with the environment, your choices will alter the world you discover in vibrant and unexpected ways, leaving you wondering what will happen with each path you forge and every hollow you stumble upon.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/642610/Shape_of_the_World/

Website:
http://www.shapeoftheworldgame.com/
